sentences.en: After a series airraid, the traffic in the capital was chaotic.
sentences.cn: 在敌人连续空袭后, 首都的交通糟透了.

sentences.en: If oil were found in great quantities, for example, would there be a chaotic land rush?
sentences.cn: 例如, 如果发现了大量石油, 会不会一窝蜂似地乱抢地盘 呢 ?

sentences.en: John's room was a chaotic mess of clothes, books, and toys.
sentences.cn: 约翰的房间乱七八糟的堆着衣服 、 书和玩具.

sentences.en: Mullins began to rummage among the chaotic mess of papers on his desk.
sentences.cn: 马林斯开始在桌子上一堆乱七八糟的文件里翻来翻去。

sentences.en: My brother was appalled by the island's chaotic traffic.
sentences.cn: 我的兄弟对岛上的交通混乱情况感到惊讶.

sentences.en: My own house feels as filthy and chaotic as a bus terminal.
sentences.cn: 我自家的房子感觉又脏又乱，活像公共汽车终点站。

sentences.en: On New Year's Eve I usually give a party, which is always chaotic.
sentences.cn: 我通常在除夕举行派对，总是很闹。

sentences.en: The market being chaotic, buyers in London are very cautious.
sentences.cn: 市场混乱, 伦敦买主都很慎重.

sentences.en: The traffic in the city was chaotic.
Things can be fairly chaotic in our house.
sentences.cn: 我们家里有时比较混乱.

sentences.en: Things have been getting chaotic in the office recently.
sentences.cn: 最近办公室的情况越来越乱了.

sentences.en: Things often appear chaotic to the outsider.
sentences.cn: 在外人看来事情常常好像一片混乱.

sentences.en: This chaotic warrior was born in the hill - cradled town of Pao An, north Shanxi.
sentences.cn: 这个乱世的豪杰生在陕西北部群山环抱的保安镇.

sentences.en: With no one to keep order the situation in the classroom was chaotic.
sentences.cn: 因无人维持秩序,教室里一片混乱.

trans.tran_en: a chaotic situation is one in which everything is happening in a confused way
